action_list.description: System action for creating an application

attrs.script:
sudo yum update -y nss curl libcurl
sudo yum install -y git

echo "Git done"

sudo yum install -y epel-release 
sudo yum install -y nginx nodejs git
sudo systemctl start nginx
sudo systemctl enable nginx
sudo systemctl disable firewalld
sudo systemctl stop firewalld

rm -rf /usr/share/nginx/html/*
cd /usr/share/nginx/html/
git clone https://github.com/mjastad/uptick.git .
chmod -R 755 /usr/share/nginx/html/*

echo "installation done"

sudo cat <<EOT > /etc/sysconfig/selinux
SELINUX=disabled
SELINUXTYPE=targeted
EOT

echo "SE Linux done"

cd /usr/share/nginx/html/
npm build ./

cd /usr/share/nginx/html/
nohup node server.js &
echo "node"
sleep 5

action_list.name: action_create
